dict.acceptation: 连接；联系，关系；连接点；亲戚；

sent.orig: This is not the same as a broken connection which would cause a connection reset error.
sent.trans: 这与导致连扌妾复位菂错误葰致菂断开菂连扌妾不同。

sent.orig: Connection pooling allows an application to reuse open connection handles, which saves round-trips to the server.
sent.trans: 连接池允许应用程序重用打开连接句柄，此操作将节省到服务器的往返过程。

sent.orig: Click the Test Connection button to verify that the connection exists.
sent.trans: 单击“测试连接”按钮以验证连接是否存在。

sent.orig: Unknown connection option in connection string: provider.
sent.trans: 这个连接字符串有问题吗？
